EmailTemplate.description: Email to End User to remind him to upload send the estimate
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Remind Complete Sheet
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Awaiting Estimate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName},
An estimate needs to be sent for the {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Experience_Client_Full_Name__c} 's By&For.
You can download a document to be used as working basis in the application: Link.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
